name: sample_ui_bddtests
description: Nightwatch UI tests for Sample project

scripts.test: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 NIGHTWATCH_ENV=$BROWSER TEST_ENV=int BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_INT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/feature_files --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @this --format junit:$RESULT_PATH/cucumber-result-$BROWSER.xml --publish CUCUMBER_PUBLISH_ENABLED=false --no-strict --retry 0
scripts.smoke: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 NIGHTWATCH_ENV=$BROWSER TEST_ENV=uat BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_UAT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @smoke --format json:$RESULT_PATH/cucumber-output-$BROWSER.json --publish CUCUMBER_PUBLISH_ENABLED=false --no-strict --retry 0
scripts.int:nightwatch: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 TEST_LOCATION=travis NIGHTWATCH_ENV=$BROWSER TEST_ENV=int BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_INT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t "$CUCUMBER_TAGS" --format json:$RESULT_PATH/cucumber-output-$BROWSER.json --no-strict --retry 1 --parallel=4
scripts.uat:nightwatch: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 TEST_LOCATION=travis NIGHTWATCH_ENV=$BROWSER TEST_ENV=uat BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_UAT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t "$CUCUMBER_TAGS" --format json:$RESULT_PATH/cucumber-output-$BROWSER.json --no-strict --retry 1
scripts.int:edge: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 NIGHTWATCH_ENV=edge BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_INT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @ui_test  --format json:$RESULT_PATH/chrome.json --no-strict --retry 1
scripts.int:chromeHeadless: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 NIGHTWATCH_ENV=chromeHeadless BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_INT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @ui_test  --format json:$RESULT_PATH/chrome.json --no-strict --retry 1
scripts.int:firefox: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 NIGHTWATCH_ENV=firefox BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_INT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @ui_test --format json:$RESULT_PATH/firefox.json --no-strict --retry 1
scripts.int:firefoxHeadless: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 NIGHTWATCH_ENV=firefoxHeadless BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_INT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @ui_test --format json:$RESULT_PATH/firefox.json --no-strict --retry 1
scripts.test:pickFirefox: NIGHTWATCH_ENV=firefoxHeadless ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js  --format json:$RESULT_PATH/test_results.json features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js --publish CUCUMBER_PUBLISH_ENABLED=false -t
scripts.int:debug: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 NIGHTWATCH_ENV=firefoxHeadless BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_INT/ downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @ui_test  --format json:$RESULT_PATH/chrome.json --no-strict
scripts.int:safari: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 NIGHTWATCH_ENV=safari BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_INT downloadFilePath=$ROOT/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @ui_test  --format json:$RESULT_PATH/chrome.json --no-strict --retry 1
scripts.int:local: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 TEST_LOCATION=local NIGHTWATCH_ENV=chrome TEST_ENV=int BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_INT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @local --format json:$RESULT_PATH/cucumber-output-chrome.json --no-strict --retry 0
scripts.uat:local: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 TEST_LOCATION=local NIGHTWATCH_ENV=chromeHeadless TEST_ENV=uat BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_UAT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @local --format json:$RESULT_PATH/cucumber-output-chrome.json --no-strict --retry 0
scripts.axe: cross-env PAUSE_TIMEOUT=1000 NIGHTWATCH_ENV=$BROWSER TEST_ENV=int BASE_URL=$BASE_URL_INT downloadFilePath=$PROJECT_ROOT/nightwatch/downloads/ ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step_definitions --require features/support --require cucumber.conf.js -t @axe --format json:$RESULT_PATH/cucumber-output-$BROWSER.json --no-strict --retry 0

author: Li Wang
